title: Sent to LOTG 1910's Japanese PCs of McGraw and White
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: Sent to LOTG 1910's Japanese PCs of McGraw and White
posts.post_content:
I am selling these two Japanese postcards of John McGraw and Doc White.

Here is a link to the thread about them:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=253615[/url]

Sent to LOTG's July auction.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314206&d=1525126624[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314207&d=1525126634[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314208&d=1525126650[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314209&d=1525126660[/IMG]
Beyond rare, these should go fast!
